ValidationRule.description: the user must specify the Number of Years In Practice (Number_of_Years) if registration (VMAP SIDE) is complete Can be bypassed if Bypass_Validations_Timeout__c > now and the Bypass field is not blank.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISPICKVAL(Provider_Registration_Status__c, 'Complete'), OR( Bypass_Validations_Timeout__c <= NOW(), ISBLANK(Bypass_Validations_Timeout__c) ), ISBLANK(Number_of_Years_In_Practice__c), OR( Number_of_Years_In_Practice__c < 0, Number_of_Years_In_Practice__c > 99 ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please specify the Number of Years In Practice since this registration is completed. Value must be greater than 0 and less than 99 years.
